name: Chance & Counters Board Game Nights
description: Two weekly board game sessions hosted at Chance & Counter's different Bristol branches. A wide variety of casual and in-depth games are played.

time.details: Arrive at any time from 6PM onwards. Check their Instagram for updates on any closures.

cost.details: All board games provided are free to play - cost covers the table cover charge for the entire evening.

accessibility.details: Wheelchair accessible, ask staff for assistance with the front door step.
